item.title: ALLEN Plus Video Downloader
item.description:
How to use this Tool

This tool Will help you to Download Video lectures from ALLEN Plus. To use this tool just refer the steps written below.

STEP-1: Enabling Right Click

To use this tool you first have to turn on right click on ALLEN Plus.

The developers of ALLEN Plus has disabled right click on the website.

So to enable right click You just have to install an Chrome Extension named "Ultimate Enable Right Click" from the Chrome Web Store.

Now go to ALLEN Plus and activate the Extension. When you click on that Extension it will ask you to reload the page. Just reload the page and your 1st step is done.

STEP-2: Getting Code from ALLEN Plus

Now play the video you want to Download.

Just right click on the video and click on Inspect.

A new window will open where you can see the code.

On that window just scroll down and find the <script>...</script> tag which is located below the

<div class="vp-alert hidden" role="alertdialog" aria-atomic="true" hidden></div> code

where you can see a big code. Just copy that code.

STEP-3: Downloading the video via ALLEN Plus Video Downloader

Now simply paste the code in the above textbox which you have copied from ALLEN Plus.

After pasting the code click on the Get Video button.

As you click on that button the video with multiple Quality options will be displayed below.

Just click on the Download button of the video with their respective Qualities you want to Download.

As you click on the Download button the video will open in a new tab from where you can view the video or can download the video easily.

This was the Easy Three Step process for Downloading video from ALLEN Plus.
